A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After giving it a days thought and seeing it a second time\, I’d give this movie a 7/10. The problems that I had the first time are still there and more noticeable. Not a bad movie\, but not that good... I never thought there would be such a cheesy Star Wars movie until I’ve seen the TLJ. To many one liners\, slow execution and poor plot decisions hinder this film from even being in the top 5. Go see this movie\, but be prepared to experience something bland.
